backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: removing founder/veteran content from section 5 and replacing it with pilot partnership messaging in FounderExpertiseSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the landing page structure, component purposes, and MOBIUS-NOVA brand styling implementation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, including custom CSS variables for the design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads Montserrat font from Google Fonts and mounts the React application at #root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the LandingPage component.
Two-column section displaying six benefit cards with Nova Gold check icons, hover effects, and an "Infinite Possibilities" callout card.
frontend/src/components/CallToActionSect: Email signup section with gradient button, input field, and three statistics (10K+ installations, 99.9% uptime, 50M+ kWh generated).
Grid of six feature cards highlighting Multi-Modal Single Core technology as the primary differentiator, with icons and hover effects using brand colors.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with MOBIUS-NOVA branding, social media links, navigation columns, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/FounderExpertise: Centered section displaying pilot partnership messaging with two text blocks: "Seeking first pilot installation partners" and "Pre-commercial prototype stage â€” be among the first".
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component displaying the MOBIUS-NOVA logo, tagline, hero content with CTA buttons, and animated background gradients with scroll-to-features functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor, switching between authenticated and anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks when backend integration is needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles defining MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors (liquid silver, nova gold, cosmic blue, etc.) using OKLCH color space, Tailwind base configuration, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page component composing HeroSection, FeaturesSection, FounderExpertiseSection, BenefitsSection, CallToActionSection, and Footer with dark gradient background.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with MOBIUS-NOVA brand colors, Montserrat font family, custom animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing architectural notes, brand guidelines (MOBIUS-NOVA branding, Montserrat font, color palette), and implemented features for the landing page.
